definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request

sentences.english: I felt cheap not being able to return their invitation.
sentences.chinese: 我爲不能回請他們而感到羞愧。

sentences.english: But it would help if his greetings were accompanied by a decent glass of wine.
sentences.chinese: 要是他回請的時候有好酒也行。

sentences.english: You may pay the friend back by inviting the friend to a restaurant some other time.
sentences.chinese: 改天你可以邀請朋友去餐館喫飯回請這位朋友。

sentences.english: He has invited me to dinner so many times,and I must reciprocate.
sentences.chinese: 他請我吃了很多次飯，我必須回請纔是。
